main event: A round-shaped object was observed moving at high speed near Lake Charles Air Force Base on August 9, 1952.
interesting points: The object hovered for approximately 10 seconds during the sighting., The observer described the sky as cloudy in spots but noted visibility was not hampered., The object was reported to be at about 5000 feet altitude and 3000 feet away from the observer., It emitted no sound and was seen moving faster than any known jet aircraft., The eyewitness stated, 'FASTER THAN ANY JET I HAVE EVER SEEN' in their report.
witnesses: Edwin C. McDonald, Captain Henderson, III
